unnormalised: Okay, so athlete biographies! Totally my jam. Remember Milkha Singh's biopic, Bhag Milkha Bhag? Inspiring stuff! I read somewhere P.T. Usha trained rigorously, running kilometers every day. Wonder if there's a good bio on Dhyan Chand, the hockey wizard. Maybe one about a kabaddi star too. Even a short one about Sachin Tendulkar's early days at Shardashram Vidyamandir!
